section.title: Map and HashMap

section.title: Processing every element in the map
section.para: To process every element a map you can use the forEach method, which take a lambda as parameter.

section.title: Getting the current value or a default for a map
section.para: Java 8 introduces the getOrDefault() method, which allows to get the current value and if this is not found in the map to return a default value.
If you want to add a new entry automatically to a map if it is not present you can use the computeIfAbsent method to calculate a value and add it to the map.
